intro.content: Time to make sushi! First, only rice and fish.
To prepare rice, say 'boil'! To cut the fish, say 'slice'. Let's get started!

outro.content: Burp if you have to! You earned it!

intro.content: Time to train your sense of taste! Vital to cooking! First, we taste soup, sushi and tea!
To eat soup, say 'slurp'! To eat sushi, say 'gulp'. To sip tea, say 'sip'! Let's get started!

intro.content: Eating time! First, only chicken and sushi!
Good protein to get nice and big!
To eat chicken, say 'chomp!' To eat sushi, say 'gulp'!

outro.content: Hey, you're a natural at this!

intro.content: Now you eat good food, reject bad food! Beef and tofu good! Soda, bad!
Soda is tasty but yeah, it's not very healthy.
If sensei gives you beef or tofu, say yum! but if it's soda, say yuck!

outro.content: You're already juicing like a pro! Keep it up!

intro.content: First we make simple  juice! First, only milk and carrots!
To prepare milk, say 'splash a dash'! For carrots, say 'slice and dice'!

outro.content: Have you done karate before? You rock!

intro.content: Good guru also knows importance of exercise! Karate time!
if sensei does a punch, say BLOCK! If sensei does a kick, say DODGE! If sensei tries a sweep, say JUMP!
